name: RPG D20 Role-Player Dice for iMessage
name_original: RPG D20 Role-Player Dice for iMessage
description:
This D20 dice is made for role player!
Roll the D20 dice, send it with iMessage and wait for the other players action.

The special thing about this d20 dice app is, that it's "cheat save". Players have to send their last dice result, before they can roll again.

In the upper right, you can decide, how many dice to play at the same time! Up to three dice can be played simultaneously.
